name: Bobby Vee
description: '''Robert Thomas Velline''' (April 30, 1943 â€“ October 24, 2016), known professionally as '''Bobby Vee''', was an American singer who was a [[teen idol]] in the early 1960s and also appeared in films. According to ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' magazine, he had thirty-eight [[Billboard Hot 100|Hot 100]] chart hits, ten of which reached the Top 20. He had six [[Music recording sales certification|gold singles]] in his career.
